SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.TNO TNO , T.TCONTENT TCONTENT , T.TPRICE TPRICE , T.TLAT TLAT , T.TLNG TLNG , T.TADDRESS TADDRESS , T.TPHOTO TPHOTO , T.MNO MNO , T.PNO PNO , T.STARTDATE STARTDATE , T.ENDDATE ENDDATE , T.DELETEYN DELETEYN , TO_CHAR(T.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE , TO_CHAR(T.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE , M.MID MID , M.MNAME MNAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CONDITION C WHERE C.TNO = T.TNO) conditionCount
, CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.TNO DESC)/ #{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) pageSize , COUNT(T.TNO) OVER() AS totalCount FROM TRADEMAP T, MEMBER M WHERE T.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND M.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND T.MNO = M.MNO AND T.MNO = #{mno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY T.TNO DESC ) WHERE pageSize = #{curPage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT T.TNO TNO , T.TCONTENT TCONTENT , T.TPRICE TPRICE , T.TLAT TLAT , T.TLNG TLNG , T.TADDRESS TADDRESS , T.TPHOTO TPHOTO , T.MNO MNO , T.PNO PNO , T.STARTDATE STARTDATE , T.ENDDATE ENDDATE , T.DELETEYN DELETEYN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE , M.MID MID , M.MNAME MNAME FROM TRADEMAP T, MEMBER M WHERE T.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND M.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND T.MNO = M.MNO AND T.MNO = #{mno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.TNO = #{tno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT P.PNO PNO , P.PNAME PNAME , P.PTYPE PTYPE , P.PGENDER PGENDER , P.PNEUTRAL PNEUTRAL , P.PPHOTO PPHOTO , P.PWEIGHT PWEIGHT , P.PHOSPITAL PHOSPITAL , P.PMEMO PMEMO , P.PAGES PAGES , P.MNO MNO , P.DELETEYN DELETEYN , P.INSERTDATE INSERTDATE , P.UPDATEDATE UPDATEDATE FROM MEMBER M, PET P WHERE M.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND P.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND M.MNO = P.MNO AND M.MNO = #{mno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P.PNO IN
#{pno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
